about.p1: Well organised person, problem solver with high attention to detail. Fan of small planes, definitely, I'll get a PPL in future. Outdoor activities, leather crafting.
about.p2: Interested in entire Front-End Developing, always ready to expand my knowledge.

skills.p1: My journey isn't too long, I've started in August 2022, and I've learnt HTML, CSS, SCSS, JS, React, Redux. Those skills were enough to build small and medium, easy to use, responsive and fast Pet-projects.

works.descr1: Web App for selling ang buying cars
works.descr3: Simple SPA Web App for buying a house
works.descr4: SPA React App about Electric Bikes
